Title: 4.11. The jsonb_insert(), jsonb_replace, and jsonb_set() functions
Feature: 4.11. The jsonb_insert(), jsonb_replace, and jsonb_set() functions
Description: 4.11. The jsonb_insert(), jsonb_replace, and jsonb_set() functions

The jsonb_insert(), jsonb_replace(), and jsonb_set() functions work the
same as json_insert(), json_replace(), and json_set(), respectively,
except that "jsonb_" versions return their result in the binary
JSONB format.
